name: Hi-Low 21 Blitz
description:
Welcome to Hi-Low 21 Blitz. A new twist on the classic Solitaire 21 card genre. A fast and fun, card tapping game where your only goal is to stay between 0 and 21. Take a trip around the world with Samantha and unlock new destinations as you progress and level-up in the game.

Master adding and subtracting cards to score big! Deceptively simple, hard to master!

Play Head-to-Head with friends or random players or in large, multiplayer tournaments for Cash & Prizes. Hi-Low 21 Blitz is powered by Skillz to give you a fun and unique multiplayer & tournament experience!

Gameplay:
• Fast 2-minute gameplay
• Tap and remove cards to score points
• Scoring multipliers will increase after you clear each deck
• Play fast to collect 2 Perfect Power-Ups to help you out of tight squeezes- bomb and skip.
• Remove bonus cards quickly to earn extra points
• Play as long as you want with NO ads!

Player vs Player Competition
• Face off against players of similar skill on the Skillz network!
* Play Head-to-Head with other players or in large, multiplayer tournaments with actual rewards.
• In Head-to-Head games, both players get the same board setup
• The player who finishes with the most points wins!

Win Big
• Enter Cash Tournaments to play against other players for awesome rewards!
• Tournaments are available around the world but are not enabled in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, IN, LA, ME, MT, SC, SD, and TN.
• Don't live in a prize-enabled region? You can still play for fun with our virtual currency!
